reply.message: Hi there, Jameelah. Thank you so much for this review! We appreciate your feedback so we can continue to improve our products and services. It’s members like you that help make MoneyLion ROAR! If you need to get support, we're happy to help. As always, please first view our FAQs (help.moneylion.com), where you can find answers without waiting. Alternatively, you can access support in these ways. Chat - resolve your issue through the chatbot or live chat with an agent! You can access the chat on the home screen of the MoneyLion app or on the bottom right of the MoneyLion web dashboard on your computer. If you need to reach us by phone you can call 1-801-252-4427 Given you’ve expressed a positive experience with MoneyLion, would you be open to also sharing this review on other review sites, including Google Play, Apple Store, BBB, and Wallethub. Thanks again for being the best part of MoneyLion!

text: Membership fee too high
title: Membership fee too high

reply.message:
Credit Builder Plus is a powerful membership that includes a credit builder loan and more. For $19.99/month, you get:
 
Loan up to $1,000 at a competitive rate
Monthly reporting to all credit bureaus and weekly credit score updates
0% APR Instacash cash advances up to $50 per pay period
Lion’s Share Loyalty reward payouts of up to $19.99/month

It’s perfect for those who have no credit or need to rebuild credit. There’s no credit check! You simply link your checking account in the MoneyLion app or dashboard, and we’ll review it for financial and other factors. If you qualify, you’ll get a personalized loan offer up to $1,000. The offer will show you how much of your loan funds you’ll get right away and how much will be saved in a Credit Reserve Account and given to you when you’ve paid your loan in full. This is to help you save while you build credit!

We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions about our Credit Builder Plus membership, please feel free to contact us.

text:
Easy to use. Easy to understand. Your choice.
Edit: thank you for the response! Honestly I love the whole app! I’m doing the build your credit money loan also! My credit score has increased. I even have my work check deposited into a roar account (I’m a server so it’s only like 40 a week) which I am using a tad bit each week in the interest building account and in 9 more months that will be vaca money. Thank you MoneyLion for this opportunity to build something! And yes I am willing to share my review to other places!

text: MoneyLion instant cash is very convenient, but i think the limit for each borrow should be up to at least $100 instead of $50. We’re already being charged $4.99 to put it in out account if we don’t choose to use our MoneyLion account. If an account holder need to borrow $75 in one day , they’re already paying $10 to get it deposited PLUS tips that you’d recommend.
title: MoneyLion instant cash is very…

reply.message: We created Instacash to help you access extra money to cover everyday essentials and unexpected expenses, and we designed it to be easy to pay back. For these reasons, we allow you to take out Instacash in increments of $50 or less. Of course, if you’ve unlocked an Instacash limit higher than $50, it will all still be available to you if you need it. You’ll just have to take it out in advances of $50 at a time. We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us directly.
